text: And the rich man and the poor man said to one another, If I give thee twenty per cent of all my gold, wilt thou adorn me? - the rich man asked. "The distribution would be too unequal for you to deserve my compliments", replied the poor man. - What if I gave you half my fortune? - Then we'd be the same, why flatter you? - What if I gave you everything? - In that case, I don't see the need to flatter you! FIN
title: ¿Para qué adular?
author: nan Anónimo
